welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wehrheim, Germany! Surrounded by picturesque forests and known for its charming half-timbered houses, this delightful town has so much to offer. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in the beauty and culture of Wehrheim.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving mainly Lufthansa and Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Opened in 1994, this terminal mainly serves non-Star Alliance airlines and is connected to Terminal 1 by a SkyLine people mover.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Currently under construction and expected to open in 2023, this terminal will serve mainly non-European airlines.

wifi.note: Limited free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with an option to purchase high-speed access for a fee.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
